message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $105, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product, which is the highest I can go.
